TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Agent extends System.Object implements class System.IComparable`1<class AIWolf.Common.Data.Agent>

Docs.remarks: Each player can identify other players as Agent. Each agent has a unique index number.

Docs.value: The index number of this agent.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(class AIWolf.Common.Data.Agent target) cil managed

Docs.param: An object to compare with this instance.
Docs.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
Docs.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.
Docs.remarks: Less than zero : This instance precedes obj in the sort order. Zero : This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as obj. Greater than zero : This instance follows obj in the sort order.

Docs.param: The object to compare with the current object.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
Docs.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, false.
